website_summaries.verdict: It's a novelty and a conversation piece, but it's also a quality ice cube tray.
pros: The silicone is safe for the freezer and also the oven
Use it for craft projects as well as making ice

customer_reviews.title: but this is a useless pice of junk for me
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's really small (making it convenient for child-sized cups, but WHERE THE HELL is WV? And why are all of the northeastern states mushed together? Still works, but this is a useless pice of junk for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you want to spend 20 minutes trying to get teeny tiny ice out.....
customer_reviews.text: This would be an epic tray - if I could actually get the ice out without a fight. It's silicone - so it should be easy (theoretically) to get out - right??? NOPE. The smaller states are EVIL and you have to try and pop them out last or run hot water over the tray to get them out. And some are ridiculously small. I'd rather they printed the lines for the states on the back (a raised divot or something similar) and grouped the states in 6 or 8 (with exceptions for California, Texas and the Dakotas) to make it easier. Way too much effort to make ice to use.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Soze

customer_reviews.title: 🗣W A S T E OF 💵 !!️
customer_reviews.text: I’m not pleased nor am I satisfied at all!!️ Why on Earth would it advertise 50 stays but when you receive the package it says “38”. Total waste of $. I was expecting at least a mold that is able to mold all of the states “enlarged”, like the photo. Smh. I DON’T recommend this product. 😒😡
customer_reviews.author: So Fetch Style

customer_reviews.title: Appearances can be deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is small. Like REALLY. And because of that, they do NOT have all 50 states! My thought is, who would buy this? Parents. Parents teaching kids about the 50 states. Or in this case, 40-something. If you live in the Northeast - you're one big blob of ice states. Then the return process... They make you wait til they receive the item to issue credit. So,... I'm waiting. And waiting. Caveat Emptor! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Inverted State's.
customer_reviews.text: Standard silicone type mold, well made. The smaller states on the Eastern seaboard are grouped together, which is understandable, but there are small lines in the mold that show each of these state's borders. The problem is they are not inverted so when you take something out of the mold there are these odd lines on the bottom of whatever you made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to get ice cubes out, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I love how it's actually the shapes of the states. However, a LOT of the ice cubes seemed to just be difficult to get out. I love novelty, though... so even though they're annoying to get out.... I'll still give it 4 stars. Also partially because I can throw it in the dishwasher and clean it that way.
customer_reviews.author: 5.slow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The states are pretty small and now I realize my friends dont know what some of the states are
customer_reviews.author: Kylah Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Fun Novelty, Less Practical
customer_reviews.text: This ice cube tray is really cute in theory, but very difficult to use practically. The ice cubes are hard to remove because many of them are so small. But I didn't necessarily buy it for its practicality, hence the four-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea! It’s a little flimsy so when filled, the water spills a little bit it’s doable. Needs to be on a completely flat surface. Ice isn’t that easy to get out but not too bad - the novelty of it is worth it. My kids like it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Fioramanti

customer_reviews.title: Can you name all the states
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to use easy and fun for kids to have the choice of which state so you want to have him drink only problem is some of the smaller states are hard to remove from the mold in tact other than that the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to make drinks
customer_reviews.text: I had to clean it a few times at first because it had some film on it that transferred to the ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit smaller than I thought it would be but was a big hit at the christmas party I was surprised by the amount of people who wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L. Bieschke

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fun! For some reason the Democratic run states end up getting used first...probably because they are on the coasts.
customer_reviews.author: OneLovelyFamily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable flexibility.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use in resin projects: needed state outlines clearly identifiable. Worked great for Montana, Texas, California, Idaho, etc. Colorado wouldn’t be especially recognizable.
customer_reviews.author: fribbles

customer_reviews.title: It will assist u to make ice!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just much smaller than I thought. Very tight to get irregularly shapes out. Florida always snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Young

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! TINY, MISLEADING, OVERPRICED, WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Completely misleading. Tiny, and all the states are not accurately portrayed due to how tiny this thing is that they just grouped the Eastern states together. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. Next to a card, this thing is barely bigger than it. For the price I paid, this is not what I was expecting. TRASH, WASTE OF MONEY, DO NOT BUY, YOU WILL NOT BE SATISFIED. OVERPRICED. Picture is MISLEADING.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Rodriguez Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: very cool idea but a bit too small
customer_reviews.text: a larger piece would make it so the ice cubes for some of the smaller states would come out more easily
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: You will regret this as much as that tattoo you got when you were drunk and 19.
customer_reviews.text: It’s impossible to get jello out of, it doesn’t work for ice either, it’s not really a map of the USA, it was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bracco

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I read the reviews before buying. Way too small! Great idea, but poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fay

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and my youngest child is learning his states this way. “Mom, I need the Texas ice cube” just something fun and extra for your house
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: What is this? A Ice tray for ants?!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sending it back. It’s too small. Thought it would be a cool thing for whiskey drinks but nah...
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and flexible. I pour wax in these to cast them and they’ve held up perfectly! Detail and all!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think...
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than it looks. Cubes don’t come out very easy. Cool idea but cubes don’t resemble the states much as soon as they hit your drink...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Ok deal
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought. The tray is cute more like sample size cubes. Good for party piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ander

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the ice out
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have checked size dimensions this thing came and it’s much smaller than I anticipated. The ice cubes are super hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Saurmeier

customer_reviews.title: smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the dimentions before buying because it is smaller than I thought and not easy to get the ice out. I was hoping it was bigger but because it is in the shape of the U S A I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy brown

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Material?
customer_reviews.text: Using the ice made from this item appears to leave a film floating on the top of the drink it is dissolving into. I do not trust this ice tray. My regular block-shape ice trays do not leave this film at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jake G.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in your hand
customer_reviews.text: This tray is so small it fits in your hand. Very disappointed. In all the pictures in have seen of this item, they made it look a lot bigger then it really is.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: East to clean and fill but WAY TOO SMALL...not all 48 states are really there as individual ice cubes...one needs almost all of the 48 states for one glass. This is sad because I thought it was such a unique idea.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this ice cube tray. They are constantly telling each other which states they have in their cups of soda or water.
customer_reviews.author: Charming One

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Waaaay smaller than pictures or description suggests. Some states have very little separation so when the mold.is.filled and released you cant tell its 3 states . looks like 1 large state
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Mae Moran

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to eat ice and I just thought he would think this was cool. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This item was not what I expected. Very small. Ice cubes hard to get out. Returning appears to be a long process. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and a conversation starter.
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than you may expect, but are still the coolest little cubes. Out of context, some of the states may not be recognizable. I love asking guests, "which states would you like in your glass?".
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: It was a little small thought it would be but it’s cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Huge pain to remove ice
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I would have read the reviews on this.
customer_reviews.author: DeLeons

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it can be great but the ice cubes might be hard to get out for young children using this product
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The kids like breaking out a state or two to make ice water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is great for learning the states. They are hard to get out of the mold. If you run the back under warm water, it makes it easier
customer_reviews.author: Satrina Watson

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you use it for
customer_reviews.text: I got it mainly for Texas so what I needed it for, it works great! Most other states are fairly small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to get the ice out of the mold. Not worth the frustration in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Weenydogsrock

customer_reviews.title: Hard to access ice cubes in the near shape of your state
customer_reviews.text: Besides MT, TX, Az,NM, and ca the states are very small and some are almost impossible to get out without breaking them ( MI OK & ID break everytime). It freezes water into shapes though and that’s it’s job 3/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift but small
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a fellow SS teacher. She enjoyed it. Was smaller than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Becky B

customer_reviews.title: I need a bigger versi
customer_reviews.text: Although this is provides "entertainment", I would like it to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as gifts. I I have not used one. I'm from Pennsylvania. My only disappointment is that Pennsylvania is not it's own shape. It is merged with NY NJ and MD. Otherwise, I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kozloski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I bought it for my iced coffee and they work so well! Although it is kinda small, it is a great size for ice! The upper east states are put together but that is bc they are small great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the person that has everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is so hard to shop for! So fun to have people guess what state is in their glass and to have california and texas in your glass : )
customer_reviews.author: Serena Clark

customer_reviews.title: nice ice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, and she learning geography...win, win. It is a little smaller than I expected, but I guess it about the size of a normal ice tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Makes learning fun
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my young nephews. They’ve had a blast learning the states and drinking them too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. Read details carefully. Found the same thing at local store for $2.99 after I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica820

customer_reviews.title: Interesting, but difficult
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get the ice out since some are too small. But it’s an interesting tray.
customer_reviews.author: SLPA :)

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well. Most of the ice cubes are a good size and its a nice silicone so that they can be easily removed. It's also super cute to have all the different states.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Damle

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Most of the states are so small the melt very fast. For once Texas is my favorite state, only because they didn’t include Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: ben kniffen

customer_reviews.title: Small - look at dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected - should have looked at the dimensions closer. Hard to get some of the states out of the mold. Cute idea, just too small.
customer_reviews.author: FlynnFam

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you take notice of the size!
customer_reviews.text: They used the biggest state in the glass. The rest are tiny.
customer_reviews.author: The Artsyguru

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wells are teeny tiny, but it does make a bunch of state shaped ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters.
customer_reviews.text: Much like a fraternity hookup... this was smaller than expected. Did the job, but was disappointed through the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ice tray is so fun and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I would hope.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I had hoped. A little disappointed but my uncle still loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these. "Mama, can I have some ice". "Sure, which state would you like".
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: If you like this kind of stuff,  you'll love this!
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to remove as I would have liked... However, once you get them out, they are awesome! Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nutrition Student

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just smaller than I thought it would be. Works great though!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten C. MacDicken

customer_reviews.title: cute. but really small
customer_reviews.text: the idea is great. the tray is really small. the cubes are tiny.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Small States
customer_reviews.text: This is WAY smaller than expected. The western states are cool and New York but the rest are too tiny for prime time.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with size of products. Only has 38 states. First product I ever thought about returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: nanapat

customer_reviews.title: Not all 50 States represented....
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea (which is why I gave it two stars instead of one) but misleading. Description says, "Makes 50 easy to remove frozen states". Not true. For example, all of New England is merged into one cube. All of Long Island Sound was left out. Mainland US only is represented. Hawaii and Alaska are not represented. Perhaps if this was sold as a set of separate molds, one for each state, that would be better.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I wanted whickey cubes! I got ice chunklets...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first off I was drunk when I ordered this and did not read the customer reviews as I normally do but seriously? I have a great group of guys that all drink whiskey together and I was excited that I could give my idiot friends ice cubes from whatever backwoods states they all come from but there is no way these would even work. When I opened the packaging I was laughing so hard I thought I needed a drink right then and there however these cubes wouldn't manage to get even the mildest whiskey cold. Moral of the story, read the reviews or don't let drunk you have your Amazon Prime password...
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Chance

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by how small this ice tray is. The states are so small, they clumped many together. And some of the states are so small it's impossible to get them out of the molds. I was hoping to use this to help my kids with geography as a fun teaching tool. But with the New England states smooshed together with surrounding states, it made it a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I got it but...
customer_reviews.text: This product, like many other reviews say, is smaller than expected. The model in the picture must be a tiny child. I was also really disappointed that the Virginias, the entire Mid-Atlantic Region, and New England, were all bunched into one piece. As a native to that area it, I was excited for each State to have it's own cube! Also, on the package it shows an ice cube version of both Alaska and Hawaii, along with the phrase "50 ways to chill" but, just as the picture shows, it is only the lower 48. Do NOT get excited by the packaging; it's lying to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Inexpensive Thoughtful Teacher Gift
customer_reviews.text: The ice cube is a silicon tray that can be used to make cakes, or candy or ice. If you make ice, you don't have the issue of cleaning it after a messy candy episode. It's small, only a few inches across, but it's fun. This is a hoot - we live in Florida, so we expressly do NOT fill the Florida cube (don't want to invite any bad weather!). They also make great teacher gifts, and people love pointing out their natal state. It's well made and will last years. Plus Amazon is way cheaper than the NPR Signals catalog, which listed it for double the price of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Atgood

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, and works easily. But!!! It’s sooooo tiny!!! My fault for not reading the dimensions, I suppose. I figured it would be normal ice cube tray sized. It’s not. Still cute, but wouldn’t buy it again due to small size.
customer_reviews.author: Laurali

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was so much smaller than I thought it would be. I know, I know the size is in the description but I just skimmed that. I thought it'd be a great novelty. The cubes are so small and hard to get out. It's currently sitting in my freezer full and no one touches it. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the ice out
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to get the states out without breaking them. I was a bit disappointed. Also thought it would be a bit larger. So far I’ve gotten out California and Washington out successfully. Florida’s pan handle broke and Oregon wasn’t so lucky either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: TINY - 8oz capacity
customer_reviews.text: Read the description carefully - not only is it only 38 cubes, it is TINY. Total volume it can hold is 8 oz - you can fit all 38 cubes in one tall glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Warren

customer_reviews.title: no one needs this as a functional item
customer_reviews.text: Ice is difficult to get out. . . besides the fact that the sections are so small, the only state that has an adequately sized ice cube is Texas.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: super super tiny.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Such a disappointment- much smaller than pictured, that glass must be a shot glass! Plus all the northeast states are lumped together. I'm from NY state and this is unacceptable. Super bummed, I'll keep looking for a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: surfgirlt

customer_reviews.title: Cute souvenir
customer_reviews.text: I've seen these in real life so I knew the actual size. I particularly ordered them because of the smaller size for taking abroad as a souvenir. They were a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ice, but it's just too small and difficult to get the ice cubes out. If it we're twice the size it would work better for ice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Really cool novelty only thing is the ice cubes are pretty small. If you are using a large glass it may use all the ice this produces
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old wanted this and he loves making the ice and then saying which states he has in his glass of water.....it is helping him with geography too. It is small so the state shape is close but a bit distorted, but this does not take away from the novelty. Fun gift
customer_reviews.author: LnicoleP

customer_reviews.title: Tiny States of A
customer_reviews.text: Tiny. Maybe it could be used to imprint a country shape on top of cookie dough? Otherwise trash
customer_reviews.author: G. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awful. Yeah it’s cool to make ice cubes out of the states. It’s hard to get the cubes out and washing in dishwasher results in detergent sticking to it revealing detergent water after putting ice cubes in.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely tiny and does not contain all 50 states. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Croom

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Mold
customer_reviews.text: The mold is tiny and the states are tinier. You can't really identify the shape of most states. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice would get others with this or another design. Perfect for work freezer.
customer_reviews.author: L S Sam

customer_reviews.title: Really fun. Cubes are small but if you like maps
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. Cubes are small but if you like maps, you've got to have this. I wish they would make a larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mau

customer_reviews.title: I'm guessing I've vines would be fine though.
customer_reviews.text: Tried Jello. Did not work. I'm guessing I've vines would be fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Holls

customer_reviews.title: Groovy
customer_reviews.text: Can be somewhat challenging to remove the ice, but ultimately a very cool item/idea.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: but it's so cool.
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than you think it will be, but it's so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TrueZoo U Silicone Mold and Ice Cube Tray Bar Cart Cocktail Drinkware, Beer, Wine, Accessory, 8", Blue
product_meta.description:
Discover the perfect gift for any proud American.

As you may see from the product images, this ice tray is molded to the shape of the USA. Does not include Alaska and Hawaii, and other states were combined to avoid having too many tiny ice cubes. Makes a total of 38 shapes. Simply pour-in your favorite fillings, freeze, and then “pop” the icicles from the non-stick silicone surface.

The tray is also oven-safe, which means you can create a range of tasty treats. You can make Jell-o, candies, frozen baby foods, ice cream, whiskey, and more! As well as being safe to use in ovens, the ice freezer tray can be washed in dishwashers, which makes it easy to clean and reuse.

• Food-grade silicone
• Non-stick
• Dishwasher-safe
• USA shape – Blue

A fantastic gift – This cool ice tray is a fun gift for 4th July, Christmas, birthdays, thanksgiving, and more. It is also great for parties and American celebrations.

Our promise to you – Being recognized for outstanding service has remained at the forefront of our brand philosophy, and always will. In the unlikely event that you’re not satisfied; we’ll replace your USA ice tray or return your money.
feature_bullets: EASY-TO-REMOVE FROZEN STATES – Measuring 8 inches long, this silicone ice tray is meticulously-crafted to the shape of all American states (sorry Alaska and Hawaii). Simply pour-in your favorite fillings, freeze, and then “pop” the icicles from the non-stick surface. Makes 38 states

CREATE A RANGE OF TASTY TREATS – Alongside being great for making ice, this freezer ice tray is ideal for making a range of tasty treats. Make Jell-o, candies, frozen baby foods, ice cream, whiskey, and more!
DISHWASHER SAFE FOOD-GRADE MATERIALS – This ice tray is crafted from silicone that is both dishwasher and oven safe. As such, this reusable ice tray is easy to keep clean
THE PERFECT GIFT for any proud American – This rubber ice tray is a cool gift for 4th July, Christmas, birthdays, thanksgiving, and more. It is also great for parties and American celebrations

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – If for any reason you’re not satisfied, simply contact us for a no hassle refund. Shop today and discover why thousands are using this fun ice cube tray to create state-shaped ice cubes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars451 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
